reactor.core.processor.util

Class RingBufferSubscriberUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.processor.util.RingBufferSubscriberUtils

  • public final class RingBufferSubscriberUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods to perform common tasks associated with Subscriber handling when the signals are stored in a com.lmax.disruptor.RingBuffer.
